thread.title: Analysts' Actions -- Amazon, General Motors, Under Armour and More
thread.title_full: Analysts' Actions -- Amazon, General Motors, Under Armour and More

title: Analysts' Actions -- Amazon, General Motors, Under Armour and More
text:
NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- RATINGS CHANGES 
BP PLC was downgraded to hold by the Street Ratings team. You can view the full analysis from the report here: BP Ratings Report . 
Capital One 
Must Read: 10 New Stocks Billionaire David Einhorn Loves 
Dean Foods was started at neutral by JPMorganm, which set an $18 price target, saying that fundamentals are mixed but improving. 
Fortinet was upgraded to buy by TheStreet Ratings team. You can view the full analysis from the report here: FTNT Ratings Report . 
United Continental was upgraded to buy from hold by Deutsche Bank, which set a $72 price target, citing an improved outlook and increased share repurchase program.
